title: Marketplace Dispute Opened
description: Fired when a dispute is opened between buyer and seller on a marketplace.

orderId.description: The order identifier associated with the dispute.

listingId.description: The listing identifier associated with the dispute.

reason.description: The reason the dispute was opened.

disputeType.description: The type of resolution being requested.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

initiatedBy.description: The party that initiated the dispute.

description.description: Free-text description provided by the dispute initiator.
